(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): As another option, you could try the "Manual Downloads and Upgrades" method.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 作为另一个选择，你能试试"手动下载和更新"方法。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Before you continue to your store, please make a note of your encryption key (Magento uses it to encrypt passwords, credit cards and more).
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 在继续您的店铺前，请记录您的加密密钥（Magento将其用于加密密码、信用卡号码等）。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Check this box only if it is not possible to automatically validate Secure URL, for example if HTTP authentication is required.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 如果不能自动验证安全URL，例如如果需要HTTP验证，就请选择该选项。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Check this box only if it is not possible to automatically validate the Base URL.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 如果不能自动验证基本URL，就选中该选项。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Database server does not support the InnoDB storage engine.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 数据库服务器不支持 InnoDB 存储引擎。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Download Magento Core Modules and Updates
Enable this option if you want to see the charts on your dashboard.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 如果您想查看仪表盘上的图表，请允许该选项。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Enable this option only if you have SSL available.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 如果您可以使用SSL，就选中该选项。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Get ready to experience Open-Source eCommerce Evolved.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 准备体验开源电子商务的进化。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Help Us to Keep Magento Healthy
I agree to the above terms and conditions.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 我同意上述合约和条款。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Magento uses this key to encrypt passwords, credit cards and more. If you don't fill in this field, we'll create your encryption key and show it to you on the next page.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: Magento使用该密钥来加密密码、信用卡和其他东西。如果你不填写该字段，我们将创建一个密钥并在下一个页面显示给你。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Please make sure that mod_rewrite is enabled in Apache configuration.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 请确保在Apache配置中启用了mod_rewrite。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Please set all required settings before clicking "Continue".
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 在单击"继续"之前请设置所有必须的设置选项。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Provide a complete base URL for SSL connection. For example: %1.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 请为SSL连接提供一个完整的基础URL。例：%1。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Response from the server is invalid.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 来自服务器的响应无效。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Skip Base URL Validation Before the Next Step
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 在开始下一步之前跳过基本URL验证

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Skip Secure URL validation before next step
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 在开始下一步之前跳过安全URL验证

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): Something went wrong while connecting to the database.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 连接到数据库时发生错误。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): The Database Name field cannot be empty.
The database server version doesn't match system requirements (required: %1, actual: %2).
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 数据库服务器版本不满足要求（需要：%1，实际：%2）。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): The table prefix should contain only letters (a-z), numbers (0-9) or underscores (_); the first character should be a letter.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 表前缀应该仅仅包含字母（a-z）、数字（0-9）或者下划线（_）;首字母必须是字母。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): This is the additional path used after your base URL to access your store Admin (e.g, Admin).
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 这是另外的路径附加到你的基础URL用来存取店铺管理（如：Admin）。

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.):
You can specify server port, ex.: localhost:3307
If you are not using default UNIX socket, you can specify it here instead of host, ex.: /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）:
您可以指定服务器端口，例如： localhost：3307
如果没有使用默认的UNIX socket，则可以在此指定，而不用在主机中指定，例如： /var/run/mysqld/mysqld。sock

(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.): You could enable this option to use web server rewrites functionality for improved search engines optimization.
（请务必将其保存在安全的地点。）: 您可以启用该选项，以便通过Web服务器的重写功能改善搜索引擎优化效果。
